origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'IndustrialImpactAPI.get_report', 'description': 'This function retrieves the industrial impact assessment report for a specific real estate project.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'projectId', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The unique identifier for the real estate project.'}, {'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report to retrieve, e.g., industrial_impact, environmental.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The industrial impact assessment report for the project.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 IndustrialImpactAPI.get_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'projectId'是'12345', 'reportType'是'industrial_impact'.
